name: Bertie Bear and the Dagger of A Thousand Souls issue 2 (OUT NOW!)
description:
The Bear is BACK!

Issue 2 has landed and Bertie finds himself and FBI Agent Alice Evergreen, flying across Europe, hot on the trail of the mysterious dagger, but he's not the only one! The villainous Vampire Cult of Orlock, lead by the Vampiric Fem Fatale, the Rose is also tracking down the ancient artefact, so that she deliver it to her Evil Dark Wizard/Mob boss Employer, Vince "The Prince" Del Vino! 

Who will get to the dagger first? 
What will happen when they find it?? 
And why didn't these accident people take better care of their dangerous, mystical WEAPONS?!!!!!

All wrapped together by cover art from Dean Beattie (Random Tales)

Don't miss out the next exciting instalment of....BERTIE BEAR AND THE DAGGER OF A THOUSAND SOULS!!!

name: Bertie Bear and the Dagger of a Thousand Souls issue 1 (3rd Printing/OUT NOW!)
description:
3rd printing cover by Martin Simmonds (Eponymous, VS Comics)

The year is 1937 and Bertie Bear, the world famous monster hunter, is on the hunt for the fabled Dagger of a Thousand Souls! A weapon of unimaginable power that, in the wrong hands, could spell grave darkness for the entire world. Which is exactly why a dark and powerful wizard known only as the Prince, wants it himself along with his hired guns, a whole cult of Vampires!

Join the adventure and travel across the globe with Bertie and his beautiful FBI companion, Agent Alice Evergreen, to see if they can save the world and retrieve the dagger before the Prince and the dark forces he commands, in the first instalment of.....Bertie Bear and the Dagger of a Thousand Souls!!

name: Bertie Badges! 38mm
description: Get the badges to go with the bear!
